@brianwmunz @ChrisFerdinandi @jamstackconf I have a selection of sizes but do try to pack outrageously light whenever possible so mostly I use 2 medium packing cubes for all my clothes and one small one for all my cables and dongles and whatnot. I try not to take an extra pair of shoes if I can avoid it.
